text: It's Amana's way of making use of spare time~

By taking pictures
of the textbook like this...

Even while moving,
you can study comfortably~

I see...!
That's a smart method.

Today, I need to review various subjects,
so...

There's also the benefit of not having to
carry around multiple books!

Amana really has good planning skills,
I need to learn from her too.

Ehehe,
Feel free to try it out~â˜†
